unnormalised: Arrey yaar, any updates on Bumrah's back? Heard it flared up again. Hope he's fit for the World Cup. Last time, he was out like in Lagaan! Also, what about Hardik's shoulder after that dive near the boundary in the 34th over? Is Rahul Chahar still recovering from that injury at the NCA in Bangalore? Need our boys at full strength, especially facing Australia. Get well soon, boys!
normalised: Arrey yaar, any updates on Bumrah's back? Heard it flared up again. Hope he is fit for the World Cup. Last time, he was out like in Lagaan! Also, what about Hardik's shoulder after that dive near the boundary in the thirty fourth over? Is Rahul Chahar still recovering from that injury at the N C A in Bangalore? Need our boys at full strength, especially facing Australia. Get well soon, boys!
